summary: Fantasy Soundtrack Project provides 800+ minutes (12+ hours) of new music for TESV: Skyirm. 235+ orchestral and instrumental fantasy/epic music tracks for exploring, towns, taverns and castles.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/jCr7Oly.png[/img][/center]
[center][font=Trebuchet MS][size=4]VERSION 4.1[/size][/font]
[color=#ffd966][size=3][u]Requires Dawnguard DLC & Dragonborn DLC[/u][/size][/color][/center]

[center]These videos show some of the beautiful songs from Fantasy Soundtrack Project in full lenght.

[youtube]qfuTRTXJ-6k[/youtube]
[youtube]y2xyHoQbprk[/youtube][/center]

[center][url=http://www.skyrimgems.com][img]http://i.imgur.com/1wXSO.png[/img][/url][/center]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/DnW1M1Z.jpg[/img]

Fantasy Soundtrack Project provides 800+ minutes (12+ hours) of new music for TESV: Skyirm. 235+ orchestral and instrumental fantasy/epic music tracks for exploring, towns, taverns and castles.

You can choose between [b]REPLACER[/b] and [b]NON-REPLACER [/b]version.

The music tracks were created by many diverse artists and most tracks are from jamendo.com, where you can download non-commercial and free to use music. You can find links to the diverse artists on the bottom of this page (credits), where you can download their music for free!

Also [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/46518/skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16754/]Dawn of Hope Music Addon[/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28951/]Additional Music Project[/url] by EvilblueKoala and [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25163/]Skyrim Soundtrack Expansion[/url] are included into Fantasy Soundtrack Project. A big thanks to the original creators. They deserve an endorsement too!

All tracks were distributed to the diverse regions of skyrim. You will hear different tracks for forest, reach, tundra, marsh and snow regions.

[list]
[*]160 tracks for exploring
[*]24 tracks for towns
[*]10 tracks for taverns
[*]8 tracks for castles 
[*]11 tracks for dungeons
[*]4 tracks for sovngarde
[*]10 tracks for dawnguard DLC
[*]8 tracks for dragonborn DLC
[*][b]Optional: [/b]20 epic combat tracks
[/list]
235 music tracks (converted into xwm and extreme compressed for small file size).
This mod uses no scripts and is safe to use/install and uninstall.

[b]Optional Combat Music Plug-in: [/b]This optional file can be choosen while installation. It adds 20 epic combat tracks to the combat music playlists. 12 normal combat tracks & 8 boss tracks.

[img]http://i.imgur.com/92LaoGV.jpg[/img]

Download the mod manually or with Nexus Mod Manager and install the mod with any mod manager you want. For uninstalling just disable the mod in your mod manager. The mod comes with an installer that lets you choose between Replacer and Non-Replacer version and also contains the optional combat music.

[b]Updating from version 4.0 to 4.1:[/b]

Remove the old version in your mod manager, start the game without the mod and save it. Close the game and install version 4.1. Start the game again and load the previously saved savegame.

[img]http://i.imgur.com/DOZFqqc.jpg[/img]

author: AceeQ

files.name: Unique Towns and Locations Music
files.changelogHtml:
40+ new tracks
added dragonborn dlc edition
removed unique towns and locations from the main file -> available as optional download
removed cell edits from dawnguard for more compatibility with lighting mods
removed the esm flag from the Fantasy Soundtrack Project.esp

files.name: Fantasy Soundtrack Project 4.1
files.changelogHtml:
New installer with the optional combat music included
Some small fixes to some music files
